pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, February 11, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by Minister of Health Patty Hajdu, will participate in a virtual roundtable discussion with healthcare professionals and advocates from across the country.

The event will be streamed live on the Prime Minister’s official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/CanadianPM.

8:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual celebration of the Lunar New Year, welcoming the Year of the Ox. He will be joined by Minister of Small Business, Export Promotion and International Trade Mary Ng, Member of Parliament for Scarborough North Shaun Chen, Member of Parliament for Don Valley North Han Dong, and Member of Parliament for Scarborough–Agincourt Jean Yip.

Media interested in watching the event live can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
